channel.title: Need some ID's
channel.description:
NOTE: Nobody suggest using an object ID list, I've tried many, but since they're all called 'Rocks' with the examine text 'A rocky outcrop' it gets me nowhere :| Unless you can point me in the direction that will be more specific or have a picture ;D Thanks :eek:
Can someone get me the ID's of the following rocks used in 'Delta Scape' sources ( I assume they would be the same since most of the skills on each source are just leached from the original in different locations with added features :D )
'Rune Essence' Rock (Gold ore) Copper Ore Outcrop Tin Ore Outcrop Iron Ore Outcrop Coal Outcrop Mithril Outcrop Adamantite Outcrop Runite Outcrop
Thanks :rolleyes: Will rep if you want it :cool:
EDIT: Nevermind I used common sense and viewed the method for ore mining in client class, only to find out that each case contains the ID for the rock you mine. Woohoo ^_^

[shadow=red,left]For items… [/shadow]ItemDB.Biz
